com.brashmonkey.spriter

Class Player.Attachment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.brashmonkey.spriter.Timeline.Key.Bone
      • com.brashmonkey.spriter.Player.Attachment
  • Enclosing class:
    Player

    public abstract static class Player.Attachment
extends Timeline.Key.Bone
    An attachment is an abstract object which can be attached to a Player object. An attachment extends a Timeline.Key.Bone which means that Timeline.Key.Bone.position, Timeline.Key.Bone.scale and Timeline.Key.Bone.angle can be set to change the relative position to its parent The Player object will make sure that the attachment will be transformed relative to its parent.
